item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18731)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @leslieherod was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=leslieherod&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: "Twenty professional women gathered on March 30, 2021, for...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Twenty professional women gathered on March 30, 2021, for a photograph on Welton Street to celebrate their work in Denver’s Five Points neighborhood. The photograph quickly became iconic to the neighborhood’s long-time residents and business owners."

The Denver Post

When 20 women gathered for a picture last month in Denver’s historic Five Points neighborhood it renewed energy in an area that was hit hard by the pandemic and racial injustice.

denverpost.com

How a picture of 20 Black women inspired a Denver neighborhood

When 20 women gathered for a picture last month in Denver’s historic Five Points neighborhood it renewed energy in an area that was hit hard by the pandemic and racial injustice.When 20 women gathered for a picture last month in Denver’s historic Five Points neighborhood it renewed energy in an area that was hit hard by the pandemic and racial injustice.
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: "New legislation would require local jails to keep youth...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"New legislation would require local jails to keep youth and people with certain medical or mental health conditions out of solitary confinement, with strict rules on when those individuals can be housed in isolation."

The Colorado Sun

Ryan Partridge had a number of run-ins with the Boulder County Sheriff’s Department in 2016. At the time, he suffered from paranoia, delusions and psychosis, and was in and out of jail for minor charges. While in jail, Ryan Partridge was often placed in a restraint chair or kept in solitary confin...

coloradosun.com

Colorado prisons have strict limits on when they can place inmates in solitary confinement. Jails could be next.

Ryan Partridge had a number of run-ins with the Boulder County Sheriff’s Department in 2016. At the time, he suffered from paranoia, delusions and psychosis, and was in and out of jail for minor charges. While in jail, Ryan Partridge was often placed in a restraint chair or kept in solitary confin...Ryan Partridge had a number of run-ins with the Boulder County Sheriff’s Department in 2016. At the time, he suffered from paranoia, delusions and psychosis, and was in and out of jail for minor charges. While in jail, Ryan Partridge was often placed in a restraint chair or kept in solitary confin...

item.title: "Colorado will pause distribution of a COVID-19 vaccine by...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Colorado will pause distribution of a COVID-19 vaccine by Johnson & Johnson while federal authorities investigate six cases in which people who received the vaccine developed blood clots."

Colorado Public Radio

Colorado will pause distribution of a COVID-19 vaccine by Johnson & Johnson while federal authorities investigate six cases in which people who received the vaccine developed blood clots.

cpr.org

Colorado Pauses Use of Johnson & Johnson COVID Vaccine While CDC, FDA Investigate Possible Side Effects

item.title: "After the shooting at a Boulder King Soopers, The Colorado...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"After the shooting at a Boulder King Soopers, The Colorado Sun researched the guns involved in the state’s long history with mass murder and school threats."

The Colorado Sun

Six days before Colorado’s latest mass shooting, the suspect bought a Ruger AR-556 pistol at a gun store near his home. Seven days before an Arapahoe High School student killed a classmate in 2013, he picked up a 12-gauge shotgun at a Cabela’s store. One day before an 18-year-old allegedly obses...

coloradosun.com

Where did they get the guns? A comprehensive look at Colorado’s history of public gun violence.

Six days before Colorado’s latest mass shooting, the suspect bought a Ruger AR-556 pistol at a gun store near his home. Seven days before an Arapahoe High School student killed a classmate in 2013, he picked up a 12-gauge shotgun at a Cabela’s store. One day before an 18-year-old allegedly obses...Six days before Colorado’s latest mass shooting, the suspect bought a Ruger AR-556 pistol at a gun store near his home. Seven days before an Arapahoe High School student killed a classmate in 2013, he picked up a 12-gauge shotgun at a Cabela’s store. One day before an 18-year-old allegedly obses...

item.title: "Lori Lizarraga — a Latina journalist in Denver — is...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Lori Lizarraga — a Latina journalist in Denver — is sounding the alarm about her former employer, 9News, for alleged discrimination in the newsroom."

Yahoo News

Lori Lizarraga — a Latina journalist in Denver — is sounding the alarm about her former employer, 9News, for alleged discrimination in the newsroom. The state of play: The first-generation 25-year-old claims 9News execs let go of her and two other on-air Latina reporters within the past year wit...

news.yahoo.com

Denver Latina reporters call out newsroom inequity

Lori Lizarraga — a Latina journalist in Denver — is sounding the alarm about her former employer, 9News, for alleged discrimination in the newsroom. item.title: "A police officer shot Mr. Wright on Sunday in Brooklyn...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"A police officer shot Mr. Wright on Sunday in Brooklyn Center, Minn., about 10 miles from where Derek Chauvin is on trial in the killing of George Floyd."

The New York Times

A police officer shot Mr. Wright on Sunday in Brooklyn Center, Minn., about 10 miles from where Derek Chauvin is on trial in the killing of George Floyd.

nytimes.com

What to Know About the Killing of Daunte Wright

A police officer shot Mr. Wright on Sunday in Brooklyn Center, Minn., about 10 miles from where Derek Chauvin is on trial in the killing of George Floyd.A police officer shot Mr. Wright on Sunday in Brooklyn Center, Minn., about 10 miles from where Derek Chauvin is on trial in the killing of George Floyd.

item.title: "...Protecting Pregnant People in the Perinatal Time...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"...Protecting Pregnant People in the Perinatal Time Period, and Maternal Health and Health Care Providers. Both are Colorado’s chance to join national birth equity leaders and make Colorado a safe place to give birth for all families."

Colorado Newsline

As long as outcomes in infant and maternal health are not disaggregated by race and ethnicity by each provider or facility, we will never capture a true idea of how well certain providers are servicing families of color. Without this data, we are losing an opportunity to address racial inequities in...

coloradonewsline.com

Why Colorado needs to pass the birth equity bill package - Colorado Newsline

As long as outcomes in infant and maternal health are not disaggregated by race and ethnicity by each provider or facility, we will never capture a true idea of how well certain providers are servicing families of color. Without this data, we are losing an opportunity to address racial inequities in...As long as outcomes in infant and maternal health are not disaggregated by race and ethnicity by each provider or facility, we will never capture a true idea of how well certain providers are servicing families of color. Without this data, we are losing an opportunity to address racial inequities in...

item.title: "After MLB moved its All-Star Game from Georgia to...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"After MLB moved its All-Star Game from Georgia to Denver’s Coors Field, many have taken to social media to compare and contrast the two systems — but they’ve missed some key details"

The Colorado Sun

After MLB moved its All-Star Game from Georgia to Coors Field, many claimed Colorado’s voting laws are more restrictive. We compared the two.

coloradosun.com

Fact-check: Colorado makes voting far easier than in Georgia. Here's how.

After MLB moved its All-Star Game from Georgia to Coors Field, many claimed Colorado’s voting laws are more restrictive. We compared the two.After MLB moved its All-Star Game from Georgia to Coors Field, many claimed Colorado’s voting laws are more restrictive. We compared the two.
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: Join Rep. Lauren Underwood, Dr. Jandel Allen-Davis, Kyla...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

Join Rep. Lauren Underwood, Dr. Jandel Allen-Davis, Kyla Armstrong-Romero - Aurora Public School Board and myself as we share our perspectives, and stories on the Black Maternal Health crisis and what we can do to amplify #BlackMaternalHealthWeek. Join below for the event at 12:00 PM MT!

This maternal health webinar is intended to amplify Black Maternal Health Week (Apr 11-17) by sharing information on the crisis provided by health care professionals and elected officials, stories from community members, and action steps, including the Black Maternal Health Momnibus Act in Congress....

cbwpa.org

Black Maternal health: Crisis, Stories, & Hope - Colorado Black Women for Political Action

This maternal health webinar is intended to amplify Black Maternal Health Week (Apr 11-17) by sharing information on the crisis provided by health care professionals and elected officials, stories from community members, and action steps, including the Black Maternal Health Momnibus Act in Congress....This maternal health webinar is intended to amplify Black Maternal Health Week (Apr 11-17) by sharing information on the crisis provided by health care professionals and elected officials, stories from community members, and action steps, including the Black Maternal Health Momnibus Act in Congress....

item.title: "Denver Artist Dan Drossman’s work is a visual...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Denver Artist Dan Drossman’s work is a visual representation of the human condition. Historical elements of graffiti, cartooning, and abstraction merge together with his intuitive process to create a unique language."

The Denver Post

yourhub.denverpost.com

Artists activate common spaces in RiNo Art District | YourHub

item.title: "The seven-member school board is ultimately responsible...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"The seven-member school board is ultimately responsible for hiring the superintendent. Board members have said they’re aiming to choose a new district leader by June"

The Colorado Sun

From 10 to 12 candidates for the Denver superintendent job are expected to participate in a second round of interviews starting next week, the head of the firm conducting the search said. A total of 32 applicants applied to lead Denver Public Schools, Colorado’s largest school district. Of those, ...

coloradosun.com

More than 30 people applied to be Denver Public Schools' new superintendent

From 10 to 12 candidates for the Denver superintendent job are expected to participate in a second round of interviews starting next week, the head of the firm conducting the search said. A total of 32 applicants applied to lead Denver Public Schools, Colorado’s largest school district. Of those, ...From 10 to 12 candidates for the Denver superintendent job are expected to participate in a second round of interviews starting next week, the head of the firm conducting the search said. A total of 32 applicants applied to lead Denver Public Schools, Colorado’s largest school district. Of those, ...

item.title: "Oftentimes, all an addict has in their fight against...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Oftentimes, all an addict has in their fight against addiction is their own resiliency. That test of wills has made it seem like DMX has lived at least 100 lifetimes with everything he endured, making the news of his death all the more sobering"

The Undefeated

DMX’s entire life story has felt like him standing down at the prospect of an early death — and the Grim Reaper retreating to a corner. But not even the old ada…

theundefeated.com

An entire generation owes DMX for his lesson in resilience

DMX’s entire life story has felt like him standing down at the prospect of an early death — and the Grim Reaper retreating to a corner. But not even the old ada…DMX’s entire life story has felt like him standing down at the prospect of an early death — and the Grim Reaper retreating to a corner. But not even the old ada…

item.title: “The people that are doing the work behind the scenes, the...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

“The people that are doing the work behind the scenes, the women today, the dispatchers, the rampers, the mechanics, the flight attendants, the people who clean the cabin, the people who are catering the aircraft, they’re all women..."

CBS4 Local

The airline says the all-female flight celebrates the talented women who already work in those positions and how they can inspire another generation to join a traditionally male-dominated industry.

denver.cbslocal.com

United Airlines' All-Female Flight Crew Encourages Women To Join Aviation Industry: 'Go For It, You're Limitless'

The airline says the all-female flight celebrates the talented women who already work in those positions and how they can inspire another generation to join a traditionally male-dominated industry.The airline says the all-female flight celebrates the talented women who already work in those positions and how they can inspire another generation to join a traditionally male-dominated industry.

item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"For the 116th Congress, from 2019-2020, Neguse managed to pass nine pieces of legislation out of more than 50 he introduced, ranking him eighth out of 240 House Democrats on the study's effectiveness scale. "

Colorado Politics

Ernest Luning: "It turns out Neguse hasn't just been a media darling and town hall maven. He was also the most effective legislator by leaps and bounds in Colorado's delegation

coloradopolitics.com

TRAIL MIX | Joe Neguse lands atop rankings of most-effective lawmakers

item.title: “A document filed this week with the U.S. Securities and...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

“A document filed this week with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission includes what's described as a six-page, single-spaced letter that asserts "a broad pattern of bias and racially-insensitive behavior" at 9News and its parent company, media giant TEGNA.”

The document was filed by a major stockholder.

westword.com

9News, Parent Company Accused of Racist Behavior in Federal Filing

The document was filed by a major stockholder.The document was filed by a major stockholder.
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: Incredibly humbled by this feature in 5280 and honored to have...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

Incredibly humbled by this feature in 5280 and honored to have community support for this work. We all have a story to tell. Our stories are our strength and our voices will be heard.

"Forget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system. And that's just the start of her ambitions.”

- 5280 Magazine

...

📸 Paul Miller Photography
Hair: Dornise LaTone Afhair
Styling: LILFRESHSAM

See MoreForget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system. And that's just the start of her ambitions.

5280.com

State Representative Leslie Herod Has a Story to Share | 5280

Forget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system. And that's just the start of her ambitions.Forget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system. And that's just the start of her ambitions.
